article_title: Candidates vie for ‘most conservative’ in the GOP 2nd Congressional District debate
article_text:
Greg Brannon, U.S. Reps. Renee Ellmers and George Holding battle in the GOP primary

Competing for attention in likely low-turnout race

Primary winner will have an advantage in November

article_metadata.title: Candidates vie for ‘most conservative’ in the GOP 2nd Congressional District debate | News & Observer

og.description: U.S. Reps. Renee Ellmers and George Holding tangled over their records during a spirited televised debate Thursday night, with Ellmers saying she wants an ethics investigation into Holding’s “lavish trips” that show that he craves taxpayer-funded luxuries.
